title.full: We Don't Live a Thousand Years

description.title: Description
description.text1: I have spent the last ten years searching and analyzing scientific research on how to improve my life. I have identified four areas of life in which you need to achieve zen to become as happy as possible: relationships with others, relationships with yourself, rational thinking, and the development of your own business.
description.text2: In this book, I have collected all the practical advice I have derived from the research I have read so that you do not have to go through my path of trials and errors again. Be ready for a qualitative jump. Buckle up. We are entering hyperspace!
description.text3: P.S. each chapter and subchapter of the book on this website has a unique link — do not hesitate to share them with friends, family, and acquaintances!
description.text4: We initially wrote the book in Russian, and I'm carefully translating it into English. Expect typos, grammatical errors, and chapters missing from the English edition until I finish translating and editing it.
